articles.title: Virus may never go away but could change into mild annoyance - WJAR

articles.title: Oxford University starts COVID-19 vaccine trial in children ages 6 to 17 - CBS News
articles.description: The university has launched a study to assess the safety of its vaccine with AstraZeneca​ in children for the first time.
